name: Alice Unlimited
description:
Welcome to Alice Unlimited. This is a Third Person Shooter controlled by cards, In real Time, no turns… (kinda)

Soon you will control Alice, trying to survive waves of crazy scientists, the more you survive and kill, the more you score.

Base concepts:

  • Each card has an action and a direction, using the card will perform the action facing that direction, for example: Shoot Right.
  • You recieve 5 random cards, each time you use one of them it gets replaced for a new one.
  • There’s a timer that counts the “freeze time” a slow motion moment for you to choose a card
  • Don’t die.

Key Features:

  • Shooting, Walking, Punching and Throwing Grenades.
  • Enemies that hunt you and punch you (insta kill).
  • Increasing enemie waves.
  • Ragdolls

Timing is the key…. Have a good game, hope you like it!

Credits:

  • Eduardo Ribas, our all-rounder pupil.
  • Giovanna Albiero Salles, Character Developer and Game Designer.
  • Gustavo Haschich, Programmer and Game Designer.
  • Kelsser Thiago, UI designer.
